commands.name: az boards iteration team add
commands.syntax:
az boards iteration team add --id
                             --team
                             [--detect {false, true}]
                             [--org]
                             [--project]

commands.name: az boards iteration team list
commands.syntax:
az boards iteration team list --team
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--org]
                              [--project]
                              [--timeframe]

commands.name: az boards iteration team list-work-items
commands.syntax:
az boards iteration team list-work-items --id
                                         --team
                                         [--detect {false, true}]
                                         [--org]
                                         [--project]

commands.name: az boards iteration team remove
commands.syntax:
az boards iteration team remove --id
                                --team
                                [--detect {false, true}]
                                [--org]
                                [--project]

commands.name: az boards iteration team set-backlog-iteration
commands.summary: Set backlog iteration for a team.
commands.syntax:
az boards iteration team set-backlog-iteration --id
                                               --team
                                               [--detect {false, true}]
                                               [--org]
                                               [--project]

commands.name: az boards iteration team set-default-iteration
commands.summary: Set default iteration for a team.
commands.syntax:
az boards iteration team set-default-iteration --team
                                               [--default-iteration-macro]
                                               [--detect {false, true}]
                                               [--id]
                                               [--org]
                                               [--project]

commands.name: az boards iteration team show-backlog-iteration
commands.summary: Show backlog iteration for a team.
commands.syntax:
az boards iteration team show-backlog-iteration --team
                                                [--detect {false, true}]
                                                [--org]
                                                [--project]

commands.name: az boards iteration team show-default-iteration
commands.summary: Show default iteration for a team.
commands.syntax:
az boards iteration team show-default-iteration --team
                                                [--detect {false, true}]
                                                [--org]
                                                [--project]
